page.title: 14Movement to New Town S.W.F.
page.content: People have moved into{South {Woodham Ferrers}from all over the country. The main reasons for moviing seem to be husband's new job or promotion and the comparitively cheap, large, new properties. The majority of workers are commuters travelling by train or car to Brentwood, Basildon, Chelmsford or various areas of London. Some people moved to{South Woodham {Ferrers}because they liked the quiet village atmosphere and the attractive well-planned location. This quiet area seems to have little trouble from vandals and everyone knows the village policemen. Some people moved to find newer and smaller schools for their children. Others moved from an over-populated built-up area. One family had been burgled in their previous home.
